plot outline: Rekha, the daughter of a rich business magnet, Rekha under mysterious circumstances is found dead in the bathtub of a five-star hotel where her mother is one of the business partners. In a twisted turn of events, Balaji, a drug-addict and Rekha's estranged uncles confesses of committing the murder. However, before he is arrested, he too is mysteriously found dead. What happens next? And how the Inspector Krishnakumar, the investigation officer unravels the truth forms the crux.
title: Roopa
plot: Rekha, the daughter of a rich business magnet, Rekha under mysterious circumstances is found dead in the bathtub of a five-star hotel where her mother is one of the business partners. In a twisted turn of events, Balaji, a drug-addict and Rekha's estranged uncles confesses of committing the murder. However, before he is arrested, he too is mysteriously found dead. What happens next? And how the Inspector Krishnakumar, the investigation officer unravels the truth forms the crux.

_Roopa_ (qv) is the daughter of a prominent and rich business man who is adored by many. Under mysterious circumstances, _Roopa_ (qv) is found dead in the bathtub of a luxury hotel where her mother is one of the business partners. Plot thickens as Balaji, a drug-addict and _Roopa_ (qv)'s estranged uncle confesses of committing the murder. However, he ends up dead before he is arrested. The story unfolds as Inspector Krishnakumar, the investigation officer unravels the truth.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
